title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-4.1 - Applicability and construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-4.1 - Applicability and construction

State Regulations

This Subpart shall apply to releases of water from the

Toronto reservoir to Black Lake Creek, the swinging Bridge reservoir to the

Mongaup River, Cliff Lake to Black Lake Creek, and the Rio reservoir to the

Mongaup River. Except as otherwise specifically stated herein, this Subpart
shall be construed in a manner consistent with Subpart 672-1 of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
